attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have several barristers advice and a police inspectors witness statement to prove that council officers stole my house making myself and my Asian wife homeless to die on a common during Winter. Why have these criminals not been arrested like the Police said they would be? Why will my M.P not meet me? Why have ouncillors been ordered not to speak to me? Why have both my M.Ps cancelled appointments to meet me? Was my house demolished because my wife was a Muslim?

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
